message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $110.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is closer to what I was hoping for, I'm still a bit away from my target price. I'm willing to come down to $95.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I understand your target price, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $95. Can we meet at $92? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
